short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create and manage Perma.cc links directly from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily create a permanent record of the web for your citations. Perma.cc allows you to capture the contents of a public website and preserve it with the Harvard Law School Library.

Connect your Perma.cc account to this extension and create Perma Links while browsing without leaving the page youâ€™d like to preserve. 

This is the latest iteration of the Perma.cc browser extension.
